abstract: The ad during the big game now must be supplemented with repeats on YouTube and promotions with sites like Twitter and Facebook.
snippet: The ad during the big game now must be supplemented with repeats on YouTube and promotions with sites like Twitter and Facebook.
lead_paragraph: FOR millions of football fans, the Super Bowl is the biggest social occasion of the year. That is becoming the case for Super Bowl advertisers, too, as they add a robust presence in social media like Facebook, Twitter and YouTube to their marketing lineups.

headline.main: For Super Bowl XLIV Advertisers, Synergy Is the Name of the Game
headline.print_headline: For Super Bowl XLIV Advertisers, Synergy Is the Name of the Game
